content.rendered:
Opportunities with Pacific Serenades

The many volunteers of Pacific Serenades are the power behind our organization. If you would like to donate your services to us during our TWENTY-SEVENTH season, we offer an array of volunteer opportunities.

Let us know how much time you’d like to give and your particular areas of interest and skills. A Pacific Serenades staff memeber or volunteer will be in touch with you.

E-mail info@pacser.org or write us at:
Pacific Serenades
Los Angeles Center Studios
1201 W. 5th Street, Suite F-224A
Los Angeles, CA 90017

In the body of the E-mail or letter please include:
Your Name
Preferred Mailing Address
Daytime Phone
E-mail
Your Business Affiliation

Availability

  • one-day project
  • one-event project
  • ongoing-once or twice a week
  • ongoing-once or twice a month
  • annual event

Ways to Volunteer

  • copy-editing and/or proofreading
  • database management
  • event planning
  • fund raising
  • hospitality/food & Beverage
  • mailings
  • membership
  • office support
  • press packets/press releases
  • printing
  • web site maintenance

Need more information? Call (213) 534-3434 and someone from our professional or volunteer staff will happily return your call.

Thank you for your interest in Pacific Serenades!
